11111.content:
you awoke to the sun on your face, and as you SLOWLY opened your eyes, you looked at the time.

"5:59! ah'd recon ah''d better ged up!"

the big red stallion said, as he stretched and yawned, before getting out of bed!

big mac opened the door to the hallway and looked around and listened... not a sound.

except for ol' granny smith, snoring in the room across the hall!

"then ah can take a shower!"

big mac though, with a hint of joy, and walked towards the bathroom, which was at the end of the hallway!

he opened the door and walked it. he made SURE to lock the door.

he didn't want it to happen AGAIN!

then he turned on the water, and waited.

it was an old shower, so it took a little while before it became hot, so big mac just had to stand in the corner, and wait for the WARM water to come.

unfortunately, this gave him the chance to think about what happen that hot summer morning.

big mac had overslept, which he never did, and RUSHED into the bathroom!

and because of all the stress, he didn't...
11111.title: applejack! INCEST IN THE MORNING!! XD lol

111111.content:
lock the door before he went into the shower! when the water became warm, he stepped under the stream, and started rubbing his head and body!

when he rubbed his crotch, his stallion hood, started to grow, and poke out! and when he turned around to wash his butt, applejack suddenly walked in, and saw big mac!

her eyes QUICKLY, darted down to his AMAZING 20 inch stallion penis! her face became as red as the apple's at their farm!

she just STOOD there. PARALYZED!

big macintosh QUICKLY covered himself, as best he could, but HALF of his penis where STILL visible!

"GET OUT APPLEJACK!!" big mac yelled, while DESPERATELY trying to cover himself, but to no use!

applejack suddenly snapped out of it, and looked up at big mac for a second or two, before RUNNING out of the bathroom, SLAMMING the door behind her!

big mac awoke from his daydream, and shaked his head, before stepping into the now WARM water!

he sighed and started to wash himself!
111111.title: lock the door, before he went into the shower!

112.content:
Name: Winter Song
Species; Pegasus
Appearance; has a pure white coat with a pale ice blue spiky mane and tail and gold irises. His Cutie Mark is an eighth note carved out of ice.
Personality: kind and caring, he has a strong honor code that has three rules: 1. never be rude to a mare. 2. always keep a promise and 3. never abandon anypony in need.
Hometown: Cloudsdale

info.brief_description: yes! it's YET ANOTHER mlp story!
info.description: well, this is gonna be a STRAIGHT, my little pony friendship is magic, story! you can chose ANYPONY you want, EXCEPT FOR GRANNY SMITH, or you can make one up! 16 is the maturity of sex were I live, so 16 and up is ok, but if that's not ALLOWED, then i'll remove it! not to old, of course princess CELESTIA is 3000 years old or something, but she's MAGIC or something so she STILL looks hot, so THAT'S ok, but don't have like, anybody's GRANDMOTHER! only use HOT pony's, and as far as i know applejack's granny is THE ONLY ONE THAT LOOKS OLD! and no scat, or anything like that, no growth or shrink or diaper or any of those fetishes, just NORMAL SEX, and incest! if you're in doubt, then just send me a message and ask, because its better to send a message and waiting a little, than using TIME and EFFORT and writing a chapter, and then have it DELETED, because it violated one or more of the rules! and plz, if you're gonna add to this story, PLZ have SOME grammar, it's pretty annoying to read something, and you can BARELY understand what its saying, im not trying to be MEAN or anything, i just want this story to be as GOOD as possible, that's all! and if i sound angry or rude or anything, im not, i just use caps to HIGHLIGHT things! :) well, i think that about covers it! straight, only hot pony's, nopony under the age of 16, or 18, if i have to change it, but i haven't had t do that on THEOTHER ONE, OK BUT ANYWAYS!!! i've keep't you for too long already, so LET'S GET STARTED!!!
info.pretty_title: my little pony friendship is magic
